article_title: Al Martello: Pitfalls of the Affordable Care Act

article_metadata.description: I recently celebrated my 50th birthday. One of the birthday cards I received was from a physician friend of mine, reminding me that it was time to undergo a screening colonoscopy.
article_metadata.author: ALFRED J. MARTELLO
